intro.content:
Hello friends!

How is this long easter weekend going?

Not so many easter eggs for me this year, but instead a nice batch of French rillettes freshly arrived from France ðŸ˜‹.
AND because I got so enthusiastic about it I found you the recipe that I listed at the end of this edition.

Bonne dÃ©gustation!

hero.description: Seoul said on Thursday it has sent a proposal for co-hosting the 2032 Olympics with the North.
hero.title: Could North and South Korea joint host the 2032 Games?
hero.why:
When I took this picture in December 2018 I remember distinctly wondering what all these Korean blue flags were.
At that time, my partner and I were visiting the DMZ and we eventually found out that the Korean unification flag is a symbol of peaceful relationship and coexistence.

So, it was a nice surprise to meet again with this blue flag.
I crossed my fingers and hope that in 2032 there will be more of this!

randomArticles.description: See how nature and logistics aligned to unblock the giant cargo!
randomArticles.title: The Ever Given from Suez canal is now free!

randomArticles.description: A designer has come up with the idea of putting flower seeds between rice paper to create a biodegradable face covering that can be planted in your garden.
randomArticles.title: These disposable face masks are designed to be thrown away.

randomArticles.description: After two years of work you can finally see 75% of the Louvre collections online!
randomArticles.title: All the collections of the Louvre

randomArticles.description: Take a live peek inside this massive bald eagle nest in Decorah, Iowa.
randomArticles.title: Decorah Eagles

animalCorner.title: Hello sweet chicken, what have you been doing?
It's not a cat, it's a tiger!

recipe.title: Wild Boar Rillettes
recipe.description: Make this rich, smooth and decadent recipe for Wild Boar Rillettes, a wonderful way to use both domestic pork and wild pork and store it for the winter months.
